snippet: A political maneuver allows people to renew their plans, but will they want to?
abstract: Editorial asserts Obama administration's policy allowing people to renew their existing insurance policies for two more years has immediate, unfortunate effect of giving Republicans another excuse to bash Affordable Care Act; argues in truth policy change, which was enacted to help Democratic senators facing tough re-election campaigns, poses no threat to health care reform and will have no impact on majority of Americans.
lead_paragraph: A political maneuver allows people to renew their plans, but will they want to?

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
